structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.catch_line: Deputy may act for ministerial officer.
law.text: Any duty enjoined by law or by the Rules of Civil Procedure upon a ministerial officer, and any act permitted to be done by him, may be performed by his lawful deputy.
law.history: Transferred 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, secs. 1 and 26, effective July 1, 1953, from C.C. sec. 678.
